title: Out of mind
author: Out of mind
content: Today while posting with a picture I noticed that after uploading and posting with TalkImg.com that picture is not showing. Those who uploaded pictures from TalkImg.com and posted them earlier are not seeing their post pictures. I request seniors to give special advice on this matter.• Is this problem from TalkImg or forum?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: TALKIMG is not having any issues; either you have uploaded an image that is not supported by the forum. There are images that the forum is against, and if you try uploading such an image, it won't be visible on the forum. If you don't mind, sharing the image here or the link could be helpful. It will make it easier for others to identify the possible reasons for that.Edit: information from  joker_josue few minutes ago, the site is down for now so you should try and using other alternative QuoteINFORMATION: We are having a problem with DNS, which is already being treated. We are trying to resolve the situation as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: The problem can not be from this forum, it is from the site. I too tried to upload an image 5 minutes ago and it brought up an invalid image on this forum. I later used https://imgbb.com/ for the upload and it was successful as usual.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Better check their ann thread[1] there's discussion already going, you don't need to create new thread everytime you faced a problem for a certain platform. Ann thread was made for such purpose.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5450546.0

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on June 21, 2023, 10:00:19 AMBetter check their ann thread[1] there's discussion already going, you don't need to create new thread everytime you faced a problem for a certain platform. Ann thread was made for such purpose.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5450546.0I have already noticed that this topic has been discussed. Maybe @joker_josue will solve this problem very soon. Found out about this issue so I'm locked the topic for now.
